user_query: I'm planning a science-themed party and I want to impress my guests with interesting facts about the elements in the periodic table.

TaskList.description: Retrieve interesting facts about the element with atomic number 26 (Iron).
Fetch the crystal structure of Iron.
Get the magnetic ordering details of Iron.
Collect physical quantities related to Iron, such as density and melting point.
Fetch relevant equations related to the properties of Iron.
